title:
The Cauchy problem for $p$-evolution equations with variable
  coefficients in Gevrey classes
authors:
Alexandre Arias Junior, Alessia Ascanelli, Marco Cappiello, Eliakim
  Cleyton Machado
abstract:
We study the Cauchy problem for a class of linear evolution equations of
arbitrary order with coefficients depending both on time and space variables.
Under suitable decay assumptions on the coefficients of the lower order terms
for $|x|$ large, we prove a well-posedness result in Gevrey-type spaces.
